summary: A police detective helps a singer heading to prison for the murder of a man she claims is still alive.
cast: Paul Langton|Barbara Payton|Robert Shayne|Selena Royle|Roy Gordon|Tracey Roberts|Kate MacKenna|Harry Harvey|Jay Adler|Madge Cleveland|William Fawcett|John Indrisano|Anthony Jochim|Harold Miller|Hank Patterson|Robert Stevenson
title: Murder Is My Beat
